name: Don't Get Catfished!
description:
The Game

Become the dreamy fish finder you were always meant to be.  "Catch" as many fish as you can before your phone battery dies, but be careful, not every fish is who they say they are. Use your trusty Dreamy Fish Dating Guidebook to discover who is being truthful.

Making the Game

This project was originally intended to be a submission for Mini Jam 105, but I was traveling at the same time the jam was being held, so I missed the deadline. I still liked the game enough to submit it though. 
(Edit: And in the end they allowed me to make a late submission <3)

The theme was "Dreamy" and the limitation was "Every Playthrough is Unique".

Initially I had a list of about 50 fish that I wanted to add to the game, and eventually shortened that down to 5 in an attempt to meet the deadline, lol.

Credits

All of the fish info is real and coms from fishbase.se. 

Jorddagreatest (that's me) - Programming, Art, Game Design

Tallbeard Studios - Music (Specifically Ludum Dare 38  - Track 6)

Filippo Game Audio - Sound Effects

Emhou - The Font

Thanks for playing! :)
